/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with traditional Chinese buildings, their curved roofs and ornate decorations showcasing the rich architectural heritage of the region. The buildings are painted in a variety of colors, adding vibrancy to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of history and modernity that characterizes Beijing.
